author: mmarinschek
msg: restricted the matching ids in findComponent (is still not a perfect, but a quite good hack now). Validation messages are shown in their extended form on countryForm.jsp as well.

author: mmarinschek
msg: The x:message tags are now extended to use the column-name as a label for all inputs in an x:dataTable, without having to specify additional information.
